This is a sample text file for testing the enhanced GrepTool.
It contains multiple lines with different patterns.

Here's a line with the word test in it.
This line has TEST in uppercase.
This line has the word testing with a suffix.
The word pretest has test as a suffix.

Here are some programming-like patterns:
function testFunction() {
  console.log("Hello world");
  return "This is a test";
}

class TestClass {
  constructor() {
    this.name = "test";
  }
  
  test() {
    return this.name;
  }
}

// This is a commented line with test in it

No patterns on this line.

Multiple test patterns test on test this line.
